title: 匠魂2真好玩
author: l'q2333xxx
txt_content: 请问哪里可以找到铝矿石

replies.author: Saierman
replies.txt_content: 下矿啊！要矿石肯定是下矿啊！

replies.author: hj2629638
replies.txt_content: 这东西很多吧,有些地方表明都会生成的

replies.author: myrymy
replies.txt_content: 一些矿沙里面也是有铝的

replies.author: Lne
replies.txt_content:
如果我记得不错的话tic2是没有铝矿的
建议加个GT

replies.author: guaiguaijiang
replies.txt_content: 下矿  应该可以直接挖到吧

replies.author: pexpect
replies.txt_content: 好像没有铝 得用其他模组的
